short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that adds Titles to Links again to Twitter/X

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of guessing games on Twitter? 😕 Ever found yourself mashing the screen hoping a picture is a link? With the X/Twitter Title Enabler, your confusions are a thing of the past! 🙌

Bring back the clarity you loved; when you share a link, the title pops right up on the image. Now, you'll know what's clickable and what's not! 🖱️✨ Say goodbye to guesswork and hello to seamless Twitter browsing.🐦🔗💡

Plus, great news for tech enthusiasts! The X/Twitter Title Enabler is open source. Dive into the code, modify it, or build upon it - the choice is yours. Check it out and contribute on GitHub (Website Link of the Extension). 🛠️🌐
